text: Lyle Wesley Waggoner (; April 13, 1935 â€“ March 17, 2020) was an American actor and former model. He was known for his work on The Carol Burnett Show from 1967 to 1974, and for playing the role of Steve Trevor and Steve Trevor Jr. on Wonder Woman from 1975 to 1979. Waggoner died on March 17, 2020, after cancer- related problems in Westlake Village, California at the age of 84.; ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Models from Kansas Category:American sculptors Category:Actors from Kansas City, Missouri
title: Lyle Waggoner
